result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Evan Latrell Buchanan

records.addlTxt: 1:48 PM Defendant Evan Latrell Buchanan not in court.  Attorney Michael Shannon Murphy appeared by video for Evan Latrell Buchanan.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Murphy enters not guilty plea on all counts on behalf of Defendant. Court orders Attorney Murphy to file authorizations by October 26, 2022 at 1:00 PM. Matter referred to Judge McCrory for scheduling.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Risk Report
No contact directly or indirectly with victim M.J.H., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No acts or threats of violence. No possession of any weapons.

3:08 PM Defendant Evan Latrell Buchanan appeared by video, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio and intern Verity Altenberger  appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Anna Elizabeth Hartz appeared by video for Evan Latrell Buchanan. Defendant address and date of birth verified.  Signature bond set of $1000 with conditions.  No contact directly or indirectly with victim M.J.H., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No acts or threats of violence. No possession of any weapons.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
